item.title: From Backend to Blackboard: My New Journey
item.description:
The New Chapter: My Transition Story Link to heading

[English] After years of deep diving into C++ and Python server-side logic and navigating through personal challenges that tested my resilience, Iâ€™ve found a new mission. My journey from a software engineer to a coding educator isn’t just a career changeâ€”it’s a commitment to passing on the torch of logic and creativity. Iâ€™m here to bridge the gap between rigorous industrial development and the boundless curiosity of young minds.
